subject: using JUnit for UI testing?
msgSnippet: Is anyone out there using JUnit for UI testing? Can you describe the framework you have created to accomplish this? At a certain point UI test requires eyes on
messageBody:
Is anyone out there using JUnit for UI testing? Can you describe the
framework you have created to accomplish this? At a certain point UI test
requires eyes on the product but how much have you been able to test up to
that point?

thx

Andy Kriger
